On 8/9/10 4:08 AM, kristsi25 wrote:
> When creating sheets to override settings in Heritrix 3, how do you override list values (e.g. the "regexList" property of the MatchesListRegexDecideRule)?
>
> The syntax in the manual only covers simple, one value settings and reading the code the Sheets class did not yield any insight.

You provide an all-new list for the overlay sheet. However, thanks to 
the 'collection-merging' functionality available from the Spring 
container configuration, you don't have to respecify all the items you 
want to share with another declared list (such as the 'default' list).

See:

http://static.springsource.org/spring/docs/2.5.x/reference/beans.html#beans-collection-elements-merging

- Gordon @ IA
